fields.headline: Whitechapel takeover: Download art by Cathy de Monchaux
fields.bodyText: Intimate and delicate, Cathy de Monchaux's images of unicorns, battle scenes and falling figures are full of tender, disquieting intensity. These four exclusive photographs depict works that haven't been seen in the UK before - one of is still in the process of being made. As the final part of our Whitechapel takeover, the artist has agreed to make these images available as high-res scans for you to download, either to print off or simply to use on your computer. Right-click on each link to do just that ... Image 1: You Had No Right to Take My Spirit (2008) Photograph: Dave Morgan Image 2: Work in progress Photograph: Cathy de Monchaux Image 3: I Am So Scarred, I'm So Scared (2008) Photograph: Dave Morgan Image 4: A detail from the Sweetly the Air Flew Overhead: Battle With Unicorns series (2007-08) Photograph: Dave Morgan
